pr_title: [systemtest] Fixes for failing tests in nightly

timeline.bodyText: Just out of curiosity - why we need 3 brokers?
timeline.author: Frawless

replies.bodyText: There was some error about AdminClient, that he cannot reach some broker and the recommended number of Kafka and Zookeeper replicas are 3. So I changed it to 3 and tried to run it 5 times, everything was passing. I'm not sure if this completely answers your question ...
replies.author: im-konge
